title: Strengthening System Design Practical Skills: Hindi Language Learning and Immediate Response System for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can use 50 basic Hindi expressions for everyday life with 80% accuracy.
Learners achieve a participation rate of over 90% in weekly math quizzes using the IRS system.
Learners maintain a response rate of over 70% in Hindi text chats with peer learners.
Learners apply 30 Hindi terminology items appropriately in context during math problem-solving processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
